body:
Missing a NTR tag. 

So the hero loses to the villain. The art is good but, honestly, the situation is a load of hot garbage. This little shrimp had my sympathies in earlier stories. Now he's no better than the bullies he accompanied before. Character development fail. Looking forward to him getting a big, fat dose of comeuppance.
kiss paizuri and i will take it everyday XD.

i feel disappointed by this one. I really enjoyed the first part and was really looking forward for part 2. but after a year and a half we got only like a third of the pages of the previous one with her narrating her story and a bunch of sex scene that didn't help move forward the plot.
Honestly, this one got downgraded from the last one a bit since it felt like the boobs were buffed beyond the point where they could look good

just like ch 1 ... you get 10 pages of great setup with a really cool hero character ... then it immediately turns into some pathetic mind control rape fantasy ... fuck that ... just want a straight-ahead sunset mask hero doujin
